abilities.desc: An icy blast followed by a wave of fire launches out in a path in front of Jakiro. The ice slows enemies, while the fire delivers damage over time.
abilities.name: Dual Breath
abilities.notes: Has a 0.2 second interval between each breath.

abilities.desc: Creates a path of ice that stuns and damages enemies that touch it.
abilities.name: Ice Path
abilities.notes: The stun is removed once Ice Path is destroyed.

abilities.desc: Jakiro burns his enemies in an area of effect with fire added to his attack, while slowing their attacks. Deals 75% damage to buildings.
abilities.name: Liquid Fire
abilities.notes: Works on both units and buildings.

abilities.desc: Jakiro adds a frost effect to his attack, stunning enemies. Enemies hit are slowed and receive a percent their max health per second plus a base amount as damage every 1.0 second for 4.0 seconds.
abilities.name: Liquid Frost

abilities.desc: Jakiro exhales a wide line of lasting flames, which deals damage per second to any enemy units caught in the fire.
abilities.name: Macropyre
abilities.notes: Units hit by Macropyre will continue to be affected after they leave the area for 2.0 additional seconds.
